other_tests.findings: Elevated urinary levels of monoiodotyrosine (MIT) and diiodotyrosine (DIT) in the homozygous sister compared to controls.
Multinodular goiter with estimated volume of both lobes at 59 ml for the index case. After a break from treatment, the thyroid volume was evaluated at 92 ml and 133 ml.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Thyroid volume increased from 59 ml at initial presentation to 235 ml after missed follow-ups.

other_tests.findings: The scan was heterogeneous, indicating multinodular goiter with a thyroid uptake of 43% 3 hours after iodine administration.
Negative, indicating that organification was not impaired.
Displayed several cold nodules in the goiter.
Revealed severe hypothyroidism (TSH 160 U/ml; free T4 0.5 ng/dl) after a period of missed follow-ups.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Observed deterioration in thyroid function over time, correlating with missed treatment compliance.
